detected_errors.description: More than 50% of rooms/spaces shown in the 2D plan segment (e.g., central hall, WC, utility/HVAC, pantry, breakfast/bench/angled bay area, stair/crawlspace area) are missing or not represented in the 3D model.

The 3D layout introduces major spaces not evidenced in the provided 2D plan crop (e.g., multiple bedrooms/alternate room arrangement), indicating a different floor plan rather than a faithful conversion.

summary: Although the second image is a true 3D cutaway, it does not match the provided 2D floor plan and omits/changes most rooms, so it is rejected.
